com.nhn.android.maps

Interface NMapView.OnMapViewTouchEventListener

  • Enclosing class:
    NMapView

    public static interface NMapView.OnMapViewTouchEventListener
    Interface definition for a callback to be invoked when an event of the map view handled.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void onLongPress(NMapView mapView, android.view.MotionEvent ev)
      Called when the long pressed event of the map view is handled.
      void onLongPressCanceled(NMapView mapView)
      Called when motion events such as moved or end is handled.
      void onScroll(NMapView mapView, android.view.MotionEvent e1, android.view.MotionEvent e2)
      Called when the scroll event of the map view is fired.
      void onSingleTapUp(NMapView mapView, android.view.MotionEvent ev)
      Called when the single tap event of the map view is fired.
      void onTouchDown(NMapView mapView, android.view.MotionEvent ev)
      Called when the touch down event of the map view is fired.
      void onTouchUp(NMapView mapView, android.view.MotionEvent ev)
      Called when the touch up event of the map view is fired.
